descriptions: ["Description- C Type - 2,213 sq.ft - Building 2- Direct Beach Access- Vacant On Transfer - Immaculate Condition Edwards and Towers are pleased to present this superb C Type 3 BR apartment in Al Dabas Building 2.This spacious apartment features a large living area with open plan living and kitchen, a generously sized master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and fitted wardrobes, 2 additional bedrooms with a shared bathroom, maid's room, and shower room. The apartment will be Vacant on Transfer and is in excellent condition. Al Shahla is located on the trunk of Palm Jumeirah, with many shops, restaurants and cafes within walking distance with direct access to a private beach and gym. It's also within close proximity to Dubai Marina, Sheikh Zayed Road and the Metro.E & T Real Estate has been trading since 2004 and has become one of the most successful real estate agencies in the UAE."]
